candidates.title: Release sc 0.45.0, codec 0.19.0, vm 0.6.0
candidates.body:
## Description

  This PR bumps the versions of core components in the klever-vm-sdk-rs repository:
  - **klever-sc**: 0.44.0 → 0.45.0
  - **klever-sc-codec**: 0.18.2 → 0.19.0
  - **klever-chain-vm**: 0.5.3 → 0.6.0

  ## Changes

  ### Version Updates
  - Updated all framework dependencies to version 0.45.0
  - Updated codec dependencies to version 0.19.0
  - Updated VM dependencies to version 0.6.0
  - Updated all contract examples and tests to use the new versions

  ### Tooling Improvements
  - **Added version bump automation script** (`scripts/version-bump.sh`)
    - Auto-detects which modules need version bumps based on git changes
    - Generates changelog from git commits
    - Supports dry-run mode for preview
    - Handles all dependency formats including TOML sections with `=` prefix

  - **Added dependency checker script** (`scripts/check-dependencies.sh`)
    - Scans all Cargo.toml files for outdated dependencies
    - Auto-detects current versions from source files
    - Supports automatic fixing with `--fix` flag
    - Provides detailed reports on version mismatches

  - **Added build automation scripts**
    - `scripts/meta-build-wasm.sh`: Builds all WASM contracts
    - `scripts/meta-update-all.sh`: Updates all contract metadata

  ### Bug Fixes
  - Fixed typos across the codebase and added typo checker workflow
  - Fixed CHANGELOG ordering
  - Fixed version-bump script to handle files without trailing newlines
  - Fixed dependency version extraction for `=` prefixed versions

  ## Testing
  - All tests pass
  - Version bump script tested on various contract examples
  - Dependency checker validated across entire repository

  ## Breaking Changes
  None - This is a compatible version update.

  ## Checklist
  - [x] All dependencies updated to new versions
  - [x] Tests passing
  - [x] CHANGELOG updated
  - [x] Version history updated in `framework/meta/src/version_history.rs`
  - [x] Scripts tested and documented

candidates.title: feat: Add KSC cloud release workflow and dependency updates
candidates.body:
## Summary

  This PR introduces a new workflow for releasing KSC (Klever Smart Contract meta tool) binaries to cloud storage and includes important dependency updates to address security vulnerabilities.

  ## Changes

  ### 🚀 New Features
  - **KSC Cloud Release Workflow** (`release-ksc-cloud.yml`):
    - Manual trigger workflow for building and uploading KSC binaries to Google Cloud Storage
    - Multi-platform support: Linux (x86_64), macOS (ARM64 & x86_64), and Windows (x86_64)
    - Binary renamed from `sc-meta` to `ksc` for clearer branding
    - Optimized for GitHub's pre-installed Rust toolchain

  - **Proxy Comparison Workflow** (`proxy-compare.yml`):
    - Automated workflow to compare newly generated proxy files with existing ones
    - Helps maintain consistency in proxy generation

  ### 🔧 Improvements
  - **Release Workflow Enhancement**:
    - Removed manual dispatch inputs from main release workflow for cleaner automation
    - Improved tag validation and error messaging

  - **Template Generation**:
    - Enhanced proxy module renaming logic to handle both `proxy_name` and `name_proxy` patterns
    - Fixed issues with lib.rs file renaming in templates

  - **WebAssembly Build System Enhancement**: 
    - Added support for Rust 1.85's new `wasm32v1-none` target
    - Implemented automatic target detection based on Rust version
    - Enhanced wasm tools installation with better target handling
    - Improved contract variant builder for dynamic target selection
  
  ### 🔒 Security Updates
  - Updated `zip` crate from 2.1 to 4.0.0 (addresses security vulnerability)
  - Updated `ed25519-dalek` to 2.1.0 with API compatibility fixes
  - Updated `indicatif` to 0.17.0

  ### 🎯 Other Changes
  - Renamed CI workflow files for better clarity
  - Fixed missing output value in koperator setup action
  - Updated various proxy files to latest generated versions

  ## Testing
  - All existing tests pass
  - Template generation tests verified with crypto-zombies example
  - Dependency updates tested with cargo check/build

  ## Breaking Changes
  None - all changes are backward compatible

candidates.title: Fix: split rustup update and target add commands in workflow
chore(sc): update changelog for version 0.44.0 && executor-rs
candidates.body:
This PR updates the main `CHANGELOG.md` file to include an entry for `sc 0.44.0`, following the format used for previous crate family versions.

It reflects the core updates included in the `release/44.0` branch, such as contract upgrades, test refactors, proxy additions, and SDK bumps up to MultiversX 0.50.4.

We are also updating the executor-rs dependency and fix the format test

candidates.title: Release: v0.44.0
candidates.body:
## 📦 Release v0.44.0

This PR merges `release/44.0` into `master`, finalizing the v0.44.0 SDK release. The release includes major features, compatibility upgrades, improved benchmarks, and several internal refactors across contracts.

---

### ✨ Key Features & Improvements

#### 🧩 New Capabilities
- **Contract deletion** support and example (`KLC-1444`)
- **Upgrade from source** using new semantic syntax (`KLC-1434`)
- **Hooks Improvements** improved KDA token hook logic ([`KLC-1122`], [`KLC-939`]) and new hooks for `CallValues`
- **Support for `has_role_transfer`** in `RolesInfo` struct
- **Add `upgrade()` method** for stateful contract versioning

#### 🧪 Benchmark & Test Suite Enhancements
- New proxy layers (e.g. `LinkedListRepeatProxy`, `AdderProxy`)
- Reworked test scenarios using new JSON interface style
- Added `mb_builder_benchmark()` for ManagedBuffer stress tests

#### 🔁 Internal Refactors & Cleanup
- Unified `klever_sc::imports!()` via `use` for consistency
- Removed outdated wasm adapter comments and features
- Cleaned redundant imports and streamlined `panic_handler` usage

#### 🔄 Compatibility & Version Updates
- SDK updates from MultiversX **0.43.4 → 0.50.4**
- Updated dependencies: `syn`, `proc-macro2`, `base64`, `sha2`, `itertools`, etc.

---

### 🧬 Modules & Contracts Touched

- `adder`, `linked-list-repeat`, `set-repeat`, `queue-repeat`, `map-repeat`, `vec-repeat`
- `bonding-curve-contract`, `send-tx-repeat`, `str-repeat`, `check-pause`
- Test suites refactored across all example and benchmark contracts

---

### 🛠 Internal Changes

- ✅ Converted macro-style imports to idiomatic `use` syntax
- ✅ Introduced proxy contracts with auto-generated `.rs` bindings
- ✅ Better path resolution for WASM adapter
- ✅ Upgraded scenario tests to the new modular testing framework
- ✅ CI Improvements
- ✅ Linting fixes

candidates.title: [KLC-1438] Replace klever.finance with klever.org
candidates.body: This PR updates all references from the legacy `.finance` domain to the new `.org` domain. The `.finance` domain will be decommissioned at the end of April, making this change necessary to ensure continued functionality
